question: Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Account Creation
text:
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Account Creation
          
        
At Virginia's Insurance Marketplace, the security and privacy of our customers and our partners who work with us to connect Virginians to coverage, is paramount. That is why
all
producers working in the Virginia's Insurance Marketplace platform
must create their own unique Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account.
If you are a part of an agency without an agency account (including producers within their own agency), then you will need to do the following to get certified through Virginia's Insurance Marketplace and create your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account:

Have a valid VA Health Producer License and National Producer Number
Complete Virginia's Insurance Marketplace Training
Allow Virginia's Insurance Marketplace 5-7 business days to complete your certification.
NOTE: If you are in an agency with multiple producers and not sure of who should be the agency manager, please dont register your agency without checking with your agency who should have this role.
If your agency has an agency account already setup but no agency manager identified, then you will need to:

Identify who should be the agency manager.
Have your designated agency manager contact the dedicated Virginia's Insurance Marketplace producer call center at 888-687-1502.
Ask the call center representative to have that producers account changed to an agency manager.
Have the designated agency manager add new agent from within their account.
NOTE: An agency can have multiple agency managers. If your agency has an agency account created with an agency manager, and you are not a designated agency manager, you need to have your agency manager add you from inside their agency manager account.
To learn more, visit the
agent vs agency manager functionality
.
agent vs agency manager functionality
